title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials and a session is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard
Verify that user session persists on page refresh

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login attempt with invalid credentials fails and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login is denied and error message about invalid credentials is displayed

title: Project Creation and Dashboard Update
description: Verify user can create a new M&A deal project and it appears immediately in the dashboard with correct ownership and structure.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the project creation page
Input required project details and submit
Verify the new project is listed on the dashboard
Verify project ownership and structure details are correct

title: Document Upload with Supported Formats
description: Validate that users can upload documents in supported formats to the data room and see upload progress.

steps.description: Navigate to project data room page
Select a supported document file for upload
Initiate document upload
Verify file is uploaded successfully with visible progress indication

title: Document Upload Failure with Oversized File
description: Verify that uploading a document exceeding the size limit is prevented with proper error handling.

steps.description: Navigate to project data room page
Select a document file that exceeds the size limit
Attempt to upload the file
Verify upload is blocked and an error message about file size limit is shown

title: Document Processing Pipeline Updates Status Correctly
description: Verify asynchronous document processing updates the document status correctly in the data room UI.

steps.description: Upload a document to the data room
Verify document status shows as queued or processing
After processing, verify document status updates to processed
Verify content is indexed including OCR and formulas are extracted

title: Conversational AI Chat Streaming Responses with Context
description: Verify that the chat interface streams AI responses in real-time, maintains conversation context and includes knowledge graph citations.

steps.description: Navigate to chat interface within a project
Send a query related to the deal
Verify chat AI response streams progressively
Send follow-up questions and verify context is maintained correctly
Verify presence of knowledge graph sourced citations in responses

title: Confidential Information Memorandum (CIM) Creation Workflow
description: Validate the CIM builder guides the user through buyer persona creation, content input, slide preview, and allows exporting final pitch decks.

steps.description: Navigate to CIM builder for a project
Follow AI-guided workflow to create buyer persona and add slide content
Verify preview accurately reflects slide content
Export the completed CIM as a pitch deck
Verify exported deck includes all created slides accurately

title: Q&A Import and Export with Excel Files
description: Verify that Q&A entries can be imported from and exported to Excel files, including fuzzy matching for data merging.

steps.description: Navigate to Q&A management page
Import Q&A entries from a valid Excel file
Verify data is merged using fuzzy matching logic
Export Q&A entries to an Excel file
Verify exported Excel file contains correct data and formatting

title: Knowledge Explorer Contradiction Detection and Resolution
description: Verify that contradictions are detected by the knowledge explorer, displayed to the user and that users can resolve or correct them.

steps.description: Navigate to knowledge explorer for a project
Verify contradictions are shown in the contradictions panel
Select a contradiction and provide resolution or correction
Verify resolution updates UI and knowledge graph state

title: Information Request List (IRL) Folder Auto-Generation and Template Use
description: Validate that IRL management supports templates for request lists and auto-generates folders accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to IRL management page within a project
Create a new IRL using a provided template
Trigger folder auto-generation based on IRL content
Verify folders are created correctly and linked to IRL items

title: Review Queue Content Approval Workflow
description: Verify that deal team leads can access the review queue, approve or reject AI-generated content, and regenerate items as needed.

steps.description: Navigate to the review queue page
Verify AI-generated content items are listed
Approve one or more AI content items
Verify approved items change status accordingly
Reject an item and trigger regeneration
Verify item is regenerated and status updates

title: Audit Trail Records User Actions Correctly
description: Verify that all critical user actions including corrections, validations, and edits are logged in the audit trail and can be exported.

steps.description: Perform various actions in the system such as correcting findings, editing Q&A, and validating data
Navigate to audit trail page
Verify all actions are logged with correct timestamps and user info
Export the audit trail log
Verify exported data contains the logged actions accurately

title: System Health Checks for Uptime and Service Status
description: Verify that health endpoints report correct system status including uptime at or above 99.9%, connectivity to Neo4j and job queues.

steps.description: Access the system health API endpoint
Verify the system uptime is 99.9% or higher
Verify health endpoint reports Neo4j knowledge graph connectivity status as healthy
Verify health endpoint reports job queue service status as healthy

title: Accessibility Compliance Verification
description: Validate that the platform supports keyboard navigation, screen readers, and high contrast modes for accessibility compliance.

steps.description: Navigate through application UI using only keyboard
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard
Use screen reader software to navigate key pages
Verify screen reader properly announces UI elements and content
Enable high contrast mode
Verify UI is readable and all components maintain usability in high contrast mode
